notes: Data copied from US Geological Survey: https://www.usgs.gov/centers/nmic/cobalt-statistics-and-information
Available USGS data goes back to 1996
Each array represents years going back from the current year
[null] represents no data for that country and year, either because it's too recent or because the country was counted under 'Other' at the time
